sentences.en: A faceless enforcer, Boba Fett's distinctive armor strikes fear in the hearts of fugitives.
sentences.cn: 追捕者波巴·费特的脸藏在头盔里,他那身独特的盔甲会使逃亡者心中产生巨大恐慌.

sentences.en: an enforcer for a drugs gang
In trading, you have to set up your own rules and be your own enforcer.
sentences.cn: 在交易中, 你必须建立自己的原则,自己帮助自己.

sentences.en: The chief of staff acts as the president's gate - keeper and principal enforcer.
sentences.cn: 陆空军司令就是总统的守门员和主要执行者.

words.tran_cn: 可实施的；可强行的；可强迫的

trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to make sure people do the things they should
